channel.title: WSTG-v42-ATHN-06 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-v42-ATHN-06 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Incomplete or No Cache-control Header Set
item.description: The cache-control header has not been set properly or is missing, allowing the browser and proxies to cache content.

item.title: Retrieved from Cache
item.description: The content was retrieved from a shared cache. If the response data is sensitive, personal or user-specific, this may result in sensitive information being leaked. In some cases, this may even result in a user gaining complete control of the session of another user, depending on the configuration of the caching components in use in their environment.
